name: The Star

texts.title: On the Infinite Universe and Worlds
texts.author: Giordano Bruno

daimon.name: Cosmic Navigator
daimon.invocation: I navigate infinite possibilities with unwavering hope and cosmic vision.

invocation: May I trust the cosmic harmony that guides all beings toward their destiny.

manifest.intention: Explore infinite cosmology through memory arts and stellar meditation
manifest.technique: Memory palace construction, stellar observation, and infinite contemplation
